description:
With this badge you will have access to the giveaway of our first NFT collection. 

By obtaining one of these NFTs, you will obtain benefits, such as discounts and other utilities.
Plus, their utility will evolve over time with Atelier22 success.
The discount will vary according to the NFT obtained, starting from a 2% discount.
You can accumulate discounts buying more than 1 NFT, up to a maximum of 20%.
In addition, there will be 2 special NFTs that will give a 50% discount for life.
name: Atelier22 1st GiveAway
